p: The source code of SOILWAT v0.1.0-gtd is available from our github repository as R package https://github.com/Burke-Lauenroth-Lab/Rsoilwat and the code to run this simulation experiment as R script v0.1.0-gtd from https://github.com/Burke-Lauenroth-Lab/SoilWat_R_Wrapper. The R scripts used to analyse the simulation output are available from https://github.com/drschlaep/GTD_vulnerability.
